name.namePart: Lindquist, G. E. E. (Gustavus Elmer Emanuel), 1886-1967

mods.abstract: Verso annotation: This flag was prepared in about 3 hours - made on tent-side- star pinnned on - should show 219 stars but ran out of material in camp - later names totaled over 500. - all related delegates attending the mission meeting at [Greenwoods?] - mostly all are members of the Y.M.C.A. or D.K.K.O. It might be called the D.K.K.O. service flag Steven Jones was chairman of Flag Committee - 6 Dak. girls prepared the stars.
mods.note: Second copy of this image is #1836.

titleInfo.title: Folder title: Indians & World War I

location.physicalLocation: The Burke Library (Columbia University Libraries) at Union Theological Seminary in the City of New York
